BadgeDetail.Name: Pitching
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge is able to persuasively explain and sell their business idea in 60 seconds.

Task.Title: Elevator pitch
Task.Body: You’re sharing an elevator with a major investor and you have 60 seconds (the duration of your elevator ride) to sell your business idea. Upload a 60 second video clip pitching your business idea. Remember to end with your ask; this could be to exchange business cards or to schedule a meeting.
Task.HtmlBody:
You’re sharing an elevator with a major investor and you have 60 seconds (the duration of your elevator ride) to sell your business idea.

Upload a 60 second video clip pitching your business idea. Remember to end with your ask; this could be to exchange business cards or to schedule a meeting.
